data: If change in hemoglobin is greater than or equal to 15 g/L, if hemoglobin is less than 85 g/L or if hemoglobin greater than 139 g/L (while on Erythropoiesis Stimulating Agent)
Recommended initial dose: epoetin alpha 50 units/kg/week or darbepoetin 0.22 mcg/kg/week (round to the neart syringe size)
Follow the BCPRA Chronic Kidney Disease Non-Dialysis Anemia Management Protocol
Follow the BCPRA Chronic Kidney Disease Non-Dialysis Anemia Management Protocol
